Course_Name: [INET] Advanced Topics in Networked and Distributed Systems [SoSe 2024]

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Peer-review and deadline of revised paper

Messages.Author: Huiran Liu
Messages.Content: Dear all,  You can view the reviews via an email from EasyChair, which you should have received now.  Sorry for the confusion, and please let me know if you haven't received yet.  Please revise your survey based on these feedback and upload the final version by July 15th.  Regards, Huiran

Messages.Author: Huiran Liu
Messages.Content: Dear all,  The deadline of registration for the "Advanced Topics in Networked and Distributed Systems" seminar examination via MOSES is 14.07.2024 23:59  Recommended way to register (if you are taking the seminar  as a standalone course): Advanced Topics in Networked and Distributed Systems  Other registration options if you need these instead and you know what you are doing: Network Architectures - Seminar Networked Systems Specialization (big) Networked Systems Specialization (small)   Regards, Huiran

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Date of final presentation and exam registration + grades until now
